Dialogue: Gone? Another one? GONE? Who keeps stealing my hospital patients?!
Is it true? Another one went missing? That is more than half of my patients now! What is going on? Where is security? Come in, security? Give me a sit rep!
A serial killer?! Oh my God… Barricaded? My God… Oh my God! We need to stop him, there may be survivors! Send someone! Send everyone! Security! Security!!!

The roof? They got on the roof? How did they get up there? Have they been there this whole time, right under my nose? For how long? How did I never find out? God, how could I be so stupid?! You are better than this Aliyah!
Pull yourself together damnit! I have to focus. These people are counting on me. Everyone is counting on me.
